errors.error_description: Specifying outdated Python 2.7 requirement and pinning very old incompatible versions of dependencies
correction_candidates: CellRank requires Python 3.8 or higher. Install using pip: pip install cellrank
CellRank requires Python 3.7+ and current versions. Install with: pip install cellrank scanpy scvelo
CellRank needs Python 3.9+. Use: pip install cellrank>=2.0 scanpy>=1.9 scvelo>=0.2
Python 3.6+ required for CellRank. Install: conda install cellrank scanpy scvelo
errors.golden_answer: CellRank requires Python 3.8 or higher. Install using pip: pip install cellrank
